A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Luke's personality rewrite: atrocious. The main characters are forgettable. The military tactics are both inconsistent with previous movies and just ridiculously bad. Watching this movie convinced me that their entire cast of writers need to be fired\, and that Disney has neither understanding nor appreciation for the star wars franchise. Lucas screwed up with bad writing and poor acting on the prequels\, but they doubled down on the worst of his mistakes and added on too many more to count.
